title: Welcome to my website for NM2207!
About
text:
This website serves as a documentation of my journey in NM2207: Computational Media Literacy, taken in AY23/24 Semester 1. On this webpage, I am excited to share my journey of learning the R programming language with you!

Weekly Progress
In the documentations page, I compiled all the Challenges and Code-alongs that I completed in NM2207 from weeks 1 to 9. The documents will be organized by week, where each week consists of a Code-along, where I followed coding practices from lecture videos, and a Challenge, where I completed coding questions. Feel free to explore my work!


Conclusion
Thank you for visiting and following along with my journey. If you have any questions or feedback, do not hesitate to contact me!

title: Ho Zhi Yi
text:
Introduction
Hello, everyone!
Iâ€™m Zhi Yi, and this website documents my journey in NM2207: Computational Media Literacy, taken in AY23/24 Semester 1. On this webpage, I am excited to share my journey of learning the R programming language with you!


Weekly Progress
In the documentation page, I will be compiling all the Challenges and Code-alongs that I have completed in NM2207 from weeks 1 to 9. Each week consists of a Code-along, where I followed the coding practices in lecture videos and a Challenge, where I completed some coding questions. Each document can be viewed in either a PDF file or run in RStudio using the R Markdown file version. Feel free to explore my work!


Conclusion
Thank you for visiting and following along with my journey. If you have any questions or feedback, do not hesitate to contact me!
